Text: First of all ,as a recent member,thanks for all of your earlier uploads.Can you please upload 'Tony Takitani' directed by Jun Ichikawa ? I am not sure if it's available in BR.
Is this in HDTV/Blu ray format? I'm handeling HD formats only. I couldn't find it. If you have some hints just tell me.

Thanks for the quick reply.Sorry I couldn't reply faster because of that DDoS attack.

Oh, it's a shame! I don't think it's available in Blu-ray format.I lost it from my back-up.And it's no longer available in my country.As a cinemaphile ,I fully recommend it ! Its cinematography is not as beautiful as Ugetsu, but it's a good little flick.Upload or not , watch it if you get the chance.You've got great taste in films. 

Are you going to upload 'In the Mood for Love' by Wong Kar Wai ? its blu-ray version is releasing in Oct.Hope I can pre-request. ;)
Thanks in anticipation.

Also sorry for my delay. Got no time unfort.

Yes, Tony will be uploaded in this format x264 / MKV / DVD / 712x460.  You will have it but not sure it will be soon.

In mods of love will be uploaded by me or someone else in 100% (just can't wait to see it)

Also inform my very few fans that I'm doing some lost Buster Keaton movies and Les Vampires (1915) from blu ray.
Thanks ,Gabe.I am looking forward to it.I love your work.
